articles.author: Michael Voepel
articles.title: WNBA players rue 'wasted' CBA talks with league - ESPN
articles.description: Breanna Stewart and other WNBA players in Indianapolis for All-Star weekend characterized Thursday's meeting with commissioner Cathy Engelbert and ownership representatives as a "wasted opportunity."
articles.content: INDIANAPOLIS -- The day after talking with commissioner Cathy Engelbert and ownership representatives, WNBA players here for All-Star Weekend characterized the meeting as a "missed opportunity." But … [+5511 chars]
